intervention_catalogue.name: Constructive Conversations
intervention_catalogue.short_description: This toolkit is made up of a series of 3 resource packs. They are designed to assist staff in structuring exploratory conversations with ‘terrorist risk' cases.
intervention_catalogue.long_description:
This toolkit is made up of a series of 3 resource packs. They are designed to assist staff in structuring exploratory conversations with ‘terrorist risk' cases.

It is structured in 3 stages:

Stage 1 - Commencing conversations

Stage 2 - Continuing conversations

Stage 3 - Changing conversations

Stages 1 and 2 can be delivered by Probation Practitioners, Counter-Terrorism Specialist Probation Practitioners and Prison Prevent Leads.

Stage 3 can only be delivered by Counter Terrorism Specialist Probation Practitioners.
